roleset.name: say, giving a clue, suggesting
roleset.note: HINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hint' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'suggest'. (from hint.01-v predicate notes)
HINT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, hint-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls say-37.7-2. (from hint.01-n)

example.name: sentential hint
example.text: Miniscribe reported a negative net worth and hinted it may file for Chapter 11.

example.name: hint at NP
example.text: Mr. Ridley hinted at this motive in answering questions from members of Parliament after his announcement.
example.arg: in answering questions from members of Parliament after his announcement

example.name: with hearer
example.text: Mary hinted to John that there might be some good eatin' at dinner.
example.arg: that there might be some good eatin' at dinner

example.name: all args
example.text: His hint to the mayor, that he would do well to qualify himself for his office by taking the sacramental test, did not help his cause.
example.arg: that he would do well to qualify himself for his office by taking the sacramental test

example.name: Light Verb: make
example.text: It sounds like he's making hints that he likes you.
